nodes.text: Alita Sweetwater was a female individual who was murdered by Blix Lanister in Anchorhead on Tatooine during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Alita Sweetwater was a female individual who lived during the Galactic Civil War. Some time after the destruction of the first Death Star in 0 BBY, Alita was shot and killed by Blix Lanister in Anchorhead on Tatooine. During 1.5 ABY, Windy Starkiller resided in Anchorhead. While here, he asked a spacer to find the wanted murderer, after he fled town.

The spacer agreed to carry out the task, and found Blix shortly thereafter. Blix was brought back to Windy, who paid the spacer 30 credits in thanks. He even said the spacer should consider a career as a security officer. Yet the situation with Blix did not end there. Windy also wanted the spacer to find one of Blix's gang members, a Rodian named Gleezwuq. Gleezwuq was the only member of Blix's gang that Windy did not know the location of. He was sure that Gleezwuq would have evidence which would implicate Blix in his murder of Alita Sweetwater.

The spacer managed to find the Rodian gang member, and killed him. On Gleezwuq's person was the same blaster that Blix used in his murder of Alita. The spacer brought the blaster back to an impressed Windy, who was now certain that Blix could be brought to justice. The spacer was once again awarded another 30 credits. Unfortunately, shortly after the evidence was brought to Windy, Blix's cohorts broke into town and helped Blix escape Anchorhead. Windy tasked the spacer with one final task, which was to find Blix and his cronies. Windy did not believe that Blix would let himself be brought back alive again. He told the spacer to do what he had to do. Ultimately, the spacer found Blix, and killed him and the other thugs. Following the successful operation, Windy awarded the spacer 100 credits.

Alita Sweetwater was a character briefly mentioned in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. Players who performed a series of quests for Windy Starkiller in Anchorhead learned that Alita Sweetwater was murdered by Blix Lanister in the town of Anchorhead on Tatooine. Players who performed a series of quests for Windy Starkiller had to escort Blix Lanister to Anchorhead, kill Gleezwuq outside of town, and then kill Lanister when he escaped from Anchorhead. The series of quests involved implicating Blix Lanister in the murder of Alita Sweetwater.

For unknown reasons, Windy was removed from Star Wars Galaxies less than a year after its release, during Publish 6 on February 11, 2004. Because Alita did not actually appear in the game, her species cannot be determined. However, the quest dialogue given by Windy indicated that Alita was a female. Although the player could choose not to do Windy's quests, this article assumes 100% game completion.
